snippet.title: Q: Translate Logistic Regression from SAS to R
snippet.description: of unemployment amongst the workforce */ proc logistic data=census; class sex(ref="Man") age idnat(ref="spanish") / param=glm; class tact (ref=first); model tact = sex age idnat / link=logit; where 15 … " = "jobless". I want to try to predict this outcome with the following variables: sex, age and idnat (nationality number). (Other things being equal). SAS code : /* Unemployment rate : number …
